REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1342 reute r f BC-PIRELLI-GROUP-<PIRI.M 06-29 0057

TEXT.TITLE: PIRELLI GROUP <PIRI.M> UNIT SELLS CABLE
TEXT.BODY: Pirelli group unit Pirelli Cable Corp's communications division said it signed a cable supply contract with NYNEX Corp <NYN> unit, NYNEX Enterprises. The company said Pirelli will supply NYNEX with fiber optic cables over the next year. Terms of the contract were not disclosed. Reuter
